doc:
Jean Sagal https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean_Sagal 0 Jean Sagal (born October 9, 1961) is an American television actress and director. In the 1980s, she co-starred with her twin sister Liz Sagal in the television series Double Trouble that ran from 1984–85. She has since appeared on such shows as Picket Fences, Knots Landing, Quantum Leap and 21 Jump Street. She has directed episodes of Two and a Half Men, Mad TV, So Little Time and Just Shoot Me. Sagal and her twin sister also served for a time as the "Doublemint Twins" in the ad campaign by Doublemint gum. Jean_Sagal ( born October_9_,_1961 ) is an_American_television_actress_and_director . In the_1980s , she co-starred with her_twin_sister_Liz_Sagal in the_television_series_Double_Trouble that ran from 1984 – 85 . She has_since_appeared on such_shows as Picket_Fences , Knots_Landing , Quantum_Leap and 21_Jump_Street . She has_directed episodes of Two and a_Half_Men , Mad_TV , So_Little_Time and Just_Shoot Me . Sagal and her_twin_sister also served for a_time as the_"_Doublemint_Twins " in the_ad_campaign by Doublemint_gum .
